sense.def:
A breach of a law or agreement
je kršenje zakona ali sporazuma.

seg.quote: It was a breach of regulations.
They were alleging breach of contract.

sense.def:
A breach in a relationship
je hud nesporazum v odnosu med dvema osebama; pogosto pripelje do tega, da se razideta.

seg.quote: This was the most profound breach in our marriage.

sense.def:
To breach a barrier
pomeni narediti vrzel v pregradi, da bi prišli skoznjo.

seg.quote: He breached the enemy barbed wire.

sense.def:
A breach in a barrier
je vrzel ali razpoka v pregradi.

seg.quote: They rush to defend any breach in the walls.
